Your voice AI companion, just like in "HER"

Our world-class voice recognition engine reveals the structure and meaning of what you say via a powerful machine learning algorithm.

Voice control your music, and more:

  • "Play Michael Jackson's Thriller."

  • "I am little down today. Cheer me up."

  • "What’s the weather in Boston today?"

  • "Tell me a joke."

  • "What's the first rule of Fight Club?"

  • "How many teeth does a shark have?"

Your voice AI companion, just like in "HER"

Voice control your music, or anything:

  • "Play Michael Jackson's Thriller."

  • "I am little down today. Cheer me up."

  • "How many teeth does a shark have?"

Sense. Learn. Match

Vinci senses your vitals, tracks your activity and learns from your listening habits. The more you use it, the more Vinci provides a personalized experience. Our unique machine learning algorithm tracks:

  • Heart Rate

  • Steps

  • Orientation

  • Proximity

  • Location

  • Distance

  • Time

  • Compass

  • Cadence

  • Speed

Interactive. Wireless. Smart

With its built-in proximity sensor, Vinci pauses the music when you take it off and resumes playback when you put it back on your head.

The touch screen lets you control your music (change tracks and adjust volume) using simple taps and swipes

Vinci integrates seamlessly with Amazon Alexa, Amazon Prime Music, Spotify and SoundCloud.

  • Local Storage

  • 3G

  • Wi-Fi

  • 50 hrs Playback

  • Bluetooth

Interactive. Wireless. Smart

Music automatically starts when you put it on and pauses when you take it off.

Control your music by simply swiping your fingers.

Full integration of Amazon Alexa, Spotify and Soundcloud.

True 3D audio recording and playback

True 3D audio
recording and playback

Binaural Recording. Microphones placed near your ears enable accurate positional recording, for an immersive listening experience.

Real-time 3D audio playback. Custom audio algorithms reconstruct the sound scape precisely by rendering audio sources as an exact point in space, to deliver a natural surround audio experience.

Augmented Reality. Head-tracking helps listeners accurately hear sound from an exact point in space, even when moving their heads. This enables new audio user interactions for augmented reality.

Great audio engineering from Sweden

Beryllium, with the best stiffness to weight ratio of any known metal, offers superior stiffness and damping. That’s why our professional 40 mm drivers use Beryllium coated diaphragms, and together with Dirac HD sound, can deliver the ultimate listening experience.

Comfortable, ergonomic design

Our design takes into account head anatomy data from over 1000 people to create the best ergonomic fit for all users. Constructed from lightweight materials, Vinci Smart Headphones are light and comfortable to wear.
